crimm.Adaptors.PropKaAdaptors¶

Derived Propka Atom class to facilitate atom class conversion for pKa calculation

Classes

MolecularContainer(protonator)

A derived class from MolecularContainer where the container is initiated with default options

PropKaAtom(biopython_atom)

PropKa Atom class - contains all atom information found in the PDB file

PropKaProtonator(topology_loader[, pH, ...])

PropKaProtonator class - contains all the information needed to run propka calculations on a protein.

crimm
